reviews.review_text: The service was great and the people were very friendly. The chicken was the best part of the Cesar salad. The margherita pizza was really good too. The ambiance of sitting outside was worth the slight cold. I guess, that s what the beer is for, right? Would eat here again!

Family with young kids seated on the corner with the Eiffel view. They were busy but we just took in the whole experience. Food and service was great and yes it came at a price but was a price we willingly paid given all of the above. One of the most memorable meals we had out as a family. Escargot were delish.

Such a wonderful place and experience. We visited this restaurant several times while on vacation. The best staff, we love Audrey. They accommodated my son and made his birthday extra special. I recommend this trattoria to anyone and everyone. The food was delicious and never disappointed. And you can also do takeout/takeaway.

Raining outside, the waiter wisked us in and seated right away. After a quick selection of food and drinks, beverages were on our table within the minute. We ordered a wild mushroom ravioli with creamed sauces and herb fragrance. Perfect way to spend lunch with a loved one  .
The food was delicious!!! Walking distance from the Eiffle tower and partial views of the tower. While we were there, they had live music. Overall a great experience.

The food was delicious, the service as well, we were walking around and were invited inside, it made us want to eat at this restaurant the arrangements, its very nice inside. The location is close to the tower, I recommend! consumption cost  84.

We visited this restaurant on the first night of our Paris trip, and loved it so much we decided to come back again for the last night. Best Italian food I ve had in recent memory, I cannot recommend it enough. Super close to the Eiffel Tower and metro line 6, so things to do nearby before and easy to get back home afterwards.
Awesome location, 2 mins walk from the tour. Lots of locals still. Food and service are both amazing. Lots of aesthetic photo ops.
Beautiful restaurant, wonderful food and fabulous cocktails (and mocktail for myself). Service was spot on with a great waiter who was very friendly.

If you go to one place on your trip to Paris, we would say to eat here! Its a 2 minute walk from the Eiffel Tower, and they had the best pizza we had ever had (note weve also been to Italy haha). In addition to that, if you want to experience French cuisine and have some authentic escargot, you can get some here!

When in Paris  - eat fabulous Pizza. The warm friendly service from the moment the staff welcomed us in, the buzzy happy atmosphere, tap beer, excellent cocktail and then one of  the most incredible pizza had us confused, so confused that we kept saying Grazie instead of Merci. We kept thinking we were in Italy.

Very relaxing place. Great food. Great service! Has great French food if you want to try more traditional items. Both the French onion food and creme brulee were amazing! Vegetarian options: Good range of Vegetarian options available

Wonderful dinner spot.  The food was fantastic.  I had the Gnocchi and my wife enjoyed the Norte Carbonara.  Both were excellent.  I cant recommend it highly enough.  The street side seating is enjoyable in good weather.

I loved this place, definitely one of the better restaurants during my stay in Paris. Certainly not a tourist trap! Really nice interior, service and food quality. I specially liked the Truffle Gnocchi
Great place, delicious food, perfect service with Dimitriy!! It was really a wonderful time. We do recommend.

Great location, very tasty food, incredible atmosphere.  Everything was incredibly tasty.  Kids friendly!  The order was ready very quickly. Kid-friendliness: There is a childrens menu with several dishes.  Everything was delicious

Great service and great food! The price is higher than usual but considering it is close to the Eiffel Tower, it is expected. We paid  8.50 for 1 liter of water (as an example  ) We ordered the bacon carbonara and pizza (can t remember which one),mojito and pornstar martini. Overall great experience, really cute decor and location. *you cannot see the Eiffel Tower from the restaurant, only the top

we enjoyed our food, it was tasty. well presented, but the service was very slow. less than 10 tables were occupied and it took over 20 minutes for our order to be taken. Vegetarian options: Verschillende opties om vegetarisch te eten
The pizza was to die for. Service was amazing and FAST despite the popularity of the restaurant. Outdoor seating was 10/10
Wonderful place with delicious food. The staff is top notch and always smiling .I recommend every guest to go and try their dishes

My meal was delicious. The French onion soup was the best Ive ever had (of course), my linguine bolognese was tasty, and the chocolate cake was delicious. The staff was attentive and the items came out at a reasonable pace (were timed well).
Just down the street from our hotel, this cozy casual restaurant serves well prepared dishes. I would recommend, dining here.

It took a long time for our server to take our order, but when she did, she was very friendly and welcoming. Once the order was taken, the food came very quickly despite how busy it was (about 11 PM on Saturday). The food was excellent. A little pricey, but it is in the center of Paris after all. Definitely try the buffala pizza and the pasta carbonara.

We had an incredible dining experience at Restaurant Firmine in Paris. After a long day of walking more than 20km around the city, this restaurant was the perfect way to end the day. We ordered a bottle of French wine (Cotes du Rhone), Planche de charcuterie et de fromages (cheese board with meat), tiramisu, and brule, and everything was amazing! The flavors were exquisite, and the presentation was top-notch. The staff was super friendly and made our night memorable. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Paris, and I will definitely be back on my next trip to the city. Thank you, Restaurant Firmine, for an unforgettable dining experience!

We went here for an after hours dinner. I ordered the Calpine. My husband had the roasted chicken.  We sat outside but it was very warm and toasty even though it was cold outside.  Festive fun vacation atmosphere.  Food was delicious. Food upscale and atmosphere was fun. Roasted chicken came with some kind of auju/gravy that my husband said was the bomb. Soooo good. Beware if you order the large size beer,  its very very large, like a viking would drink.    Our waiter, Yazid, was great. Came to the table when we needed him and not when we didnt. Timing was perfect. Amazing beautiful date night.

Great atmosphere. Great service, specially Roberto. The food was delicious. We visited 3 times  for dinner .. as we stayed 2 min. From the restaurant ..   a little bit expensive but we enjoyed it so much.
The food was amazing. Pricing is comparable to the other restaurants in the area. Food

Our first night in Paris was filled with iconic views of the city skyline and the beacon of the Eiffel Tower from above and below. We had settled on the idea of eating somewhere the atmosphere was alive and wow was it electric inside Firmine. From beautiful decor to the family feel service it was a great experience. The highlight of the evening was the food without a doubt, we opted for a ribeye steak cooked medium rare, grilled tiger prawn risotto, and mushroom ravioli. Each dish had its own brilliance but the star of our dinner was the pavlova dessert which was just incredible.

Was amazing to eat pizza here! I really enjoyed it! Each piece! Till the ends!!! I never usually eat the ends, but this time I ate them all! It was something out of the mind! I am sure all of other things are going to be so good too! I m going to discover it! Thank you so much for showing different kind of taste in the food! You have a really great Chef! Thank you for amazing food!

Great atmosphere around the corner of Eiffel Tower. Food is also A++ We had an amazing service from Mimi. She was great and make us really feel at home. She never said No also any of our requests. So kind, wanna thank her. Food : 5/5
Expensive but honestly everywhere is around the Eiffel Tower so you just need to close your eyes and order what you like! The Carbonara is LOVELY! Highly recommend
Great Place to eat, friendly service and a good menu choice.

Best Italian we ate while in Paris! The bolognaise was 10/10 and my friend had the margarita which she thoroughly enjoyed too! all staff were super friendly and nice along with brilliant service so all in all would rate 10/5 :)
Great service, delicious food. Cant see eifel tower, but wonderful time.

This is the best place Ive been in Paris! 100% recommend! MATTHEW AND BALWIN were outstanding VERY accommodating and friendly! The food is next level! If you are looking for a top tier experience please stop here! I cannot say enough about this place!

On the hustling streets of Paris, with a view of the tip of the Eiffel tower, Firmine was a lovely stop for an afternoon pick me up! We shared a Cesar salad and Buffala pizza. The salad was fine but the pizza was delicious! We also enjoyed a couple of glasses of Minuty Rose that were perfect for a warm afternoon. The servers were welcoming and spoke enough English for us to order and ask questions.  Highly recommended!
Visited here with my daughter a few days ago. The food was great and so was the service.  I will definitely be visiting again when I come back to Paris.

First time in Paris and we just got off a 4 hour bus ride from Belgium due to complications out of our control but still had enough time to  visit this area so the local restaurants had certain times of open / close so the Uber dropped us off close to Firmine and what a pleasant surprise to sit and enjoy the scenery and service/ price very good. Thanks for our experience we will cherish this along with other memories we have.
Great restaurant! Everything so delicious! And the stuff are great ! Hope to come again thank you!!!
A very nice little restaurant, Friendly atmosphere and staff. The portions are very generous and good value for money.
As any other restaurant in Paris this was one of our favorite. Delicious pizza. Good service and beautiful atmosphere. I think they have the best mozzarella sticks. Loved it
The pasta was creamy and delicious, for dessert the creme brulee was exquisite

The cute waiter was great and funny always cracking jokes. We were English speakers who also speak French and felt very welcomed and comfortable. Food was delicious and worth the price. Definitely a good and accepting place if you are American. Wonderful staff in general.
Food was amazing, really enjoyed it. The free bread that was bought out with the food was the best Ive had in a long time. The lady that served us was lovely too. Food
Our server Yazid was very nice and the food was amazing.
Really really great pasta! Just wish it wasn t so pricey.
Food was great. Good atmosphere.

The best restaurant ever. My wife and I went to this restaurant twice for dinner on our honeymoon. We came across it just by chance and it turned out to be amazing. We had the French onion soup which was amazing and we also ordered the snails and the duck. The food was just insane. You will not regret eating at this place.
This place wax really nice. Each time we went we did have to wait a bit to be waited on, and even got skipped once, but other than that and the service from a few ppl, it was nice. Food was amazing!
Amazing place I highly recommend Service was excellent, it was a great experience and outstanding food taste. Loved the onion soup and pizza Regina Recommended dishes French Onion Soup

Stopped for a beer! had mozzarella sticks, escargot, chips, tea and yes more beers!! Great service ! Great attention from our super busy  waiter who helped mum deshell her escargot! Whom, she thought were so good Brief but GREAT stop! Highly recommend the beers!!
Sonny was a very attentive helpful waiter. Food was excellent and arrived quickly. Truffle bread was wonderful as was the bolognese!
Very tasty! Nice and polite service. Everything was excellent. Only 3 minutes walk to the Eiffel Tower. Strongly recommended.

We had nothing but fantastic service! We werent the happiest of customers after a long stressful day, but the server treated us with dignity and compassion and really raised our spirits until we were laughing and enjoying ourselves again! We had the margarita pizza and some wine, absolutely lovely!

Such good food! My wife had a pasta dish that tasted unlike any pasta I ve ever had and the chicken and chips I got were both cooked to perfection and tasted amazing. Can t believe there was food this great, this close to the Eiffel Tower at a price that s more reasonable than a lot of the other stuff in the area!!
We came here last night. The place is very cozy and very beautiful. The waiter was very friendly. Food delicious and the wine really tasty. At last the creme brulee was fantastic! Totally recommend!!
We passed by this place and yummm highly recommended. Service is 100% great. We ordered pizza and chardonnay. Super like it!
Great place and great food. Perfect location to take a walk next to the Eiffel tower before/after eating. Recommend the onion soup and escargot!

I went to France for my best friends wedding and we had a few days before the big day to explore! One day we went to the Eiffel Tower and after seeing the Eiffel Tower, we walked around the nearby streets and came across this beautiful restaurant! I wasnt super hungry so I decided to get the Chicken Ceasar  Salad! Honestly, it was the best tasting chicken ceasar salad Ive ever had!    Enjoy the decor too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning We are happy to learn that your experience was satisfactory hope to welcome you soon
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Bonjour nous somme heureux d apprendre que votre experience etait satisfaisante esperons vous accueillir prochainement

reviews.review_text: Very caring, kind and observant staff. One of the few restaurants in Paris where they speak english, and their menu is readable in english as well. The waitress immediately helped us out, seating us, making sure we dont wait too much, we have everything we need etc. The food is amazing, flavourful, delicious. Real italian dishes are available alomg the french traditional foods. I really recommend this place for everyone
Food was incredible and service was GREAT!!

Amazing service from Yazid, he was cute and helpful, made us feel welcome and answered any queries to the best of his ability. Food and drinks was AMAZING! Food quality was good, good portions, good taste and cocktails were really strong!

Fabulous food. One of the best pizzas in Paris. Cosy French vibe with amazing Italian food. Pistachio Tiramisu was incredible would highly recommend. Yazid our waiter was highly attentive and very friendly. Would eat here again !

Firmine is one of those hidden gems that you find during your stay. It was close to our hotel and beautifully a block away from the Eiffel Tower so we we gave it a try and ended up coming back again before our vacation ended. Service was great, waiters are attentive, friendly and accommodating, and food came out fast every time even during busy dinner times. Everything I ate was delicious. I asked for the pizza to be made into a heart shape and they did it no prob. The pizza had the perfect sauce to cheese ratio, it was so good. Would return on my next trip.
Pleasantly surprised. Really good food, very well priced and right near eiffel tower. Open until late which is great for tourists!
Everything is professional    The dishes, the treatment of the staff , Especially clay ,, and the place are beautiful
Excellent pizza with a GREAT crust. Service was super friendly. Restaurant can be a little crowded. Prices are high but worth it. (2 people, sans alcohol, 70 Euro)
Nice view of avenue leading to a view of the Eiffel tower. Staff was accomodating . Salad fresh and copious. Tasty Pizza. You can eat quickly or take your time.

I had the absolute pleasure of dining at Firmine, the charming Italian restaurant nestled within a short stroll from the iconic Eiffel Tower in Paris. From the moment I walked in, I knew this was going to be a memorable experience. Our server, Balvin, added a delightful touch to our evening. His warm and friendly demeanor made practicing my basic French an absolute joy. He was attentive, considerate, and a true gentleman throughout our meal. Now, lets talk about the food! We ordered the Diavola pizza, and it was nothing short of amazing. Having just arrived from Italy earlier in the day, we were pleasantly surprised that it measured up to the authentic Italian pizza we know and love. The ambiance at Firmine is simply enchanting. The music created the perfect backdrop, and the lighting set a romantic mood that made our dinner even more special. While its true that dining at Firmine may be a bit on the pricey side, its entirely understandable given its prime location near the Eiffel Tower. After all, real estate in such a prestigious area certainly comes at a premium. Lastly, I must debunk a common stereotype about Parisian restaurants. Contrary to the belief that they may have snooty staff, our experience at Firmine was the complete opposite. Balvin and the entire team were warm, welcoming, and genuinely interested in ensuring we had a fantastic dining experience. In summary, Firmine exceeded all expectations, earning a solid 5/5 rating. If you find yourself in Paris and crave a taste of Italy in the shadow of the Eiffel Tower, dont hesitate to make a reservation at this hidden gem. You wont be disappointed!
Amazing! It s by reservation. Waitress and waiters we re nice, food arrived fast, and the place is beautiful too

If you re looking for a meal after traveling or exploring Paris and you re in the area, search no more! Nice staff, friendly, a bit crowded on the terrace ( but aren t they all in Paris?). Most important, pizza and salat we had were good. We did not wait much. Also the pineapple& passion fruit non-alcoholic cocktail was super good! Give it a try!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning We are happy to learn that your experience was satisfactory We hope to welcome you soon
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Bonjour nous somme heureux d apprendre que votre experience etait satisfaisante Nous esperons vous accueillir prochainement

reviews.review_text: We came here looking for a bite to eat before viewing the Eiffel Tower in the evening . The wait staff was friendly, spoke good english and were attentive . The prices were fair, portion size generous and the food was delicious!!! . No complaints and would definitely visit again .

As New Yorkers we are always in a hurry. I guess that is just in our blood. The French take their time which is something they do and is part of their culture. You just have to respect it and not get upset. Something that is very hard for someone to get use to. Repect it, your in their country. So, you are probably wondering why Im saying this????? Its because the food came out fast and the food was wonderful. Our server Julien was personal and charismatic. He made our experience in this restaurant outstanding. Highly recommend.

We had coffee and dessert and the place is only a block away from the Eiffel Tower .  The staff is friendly  and makes this place more enjoyable and provide great experience.  Remarkable pleasing vibes and great ambience !

Ahmed, did a fantastic service for us.  Took care of every request quickly.  My kid was not feeling well, so Ahmed brought warm tea. Will come back to this place. Alex. Kid-friendliness: Kids friendly
We went for dinner 50 before closing. They served us with a lot of willingness, they were very kind. The food came very quickly, it was delicious. One of the best restaurants in the area.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning We are happy to learn that your experience was satisfactory hope to welcome you soon
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Bonjour nous somme heureux d apprendre que votre experience etait satisfaisante esperons vous accueillir prochainement

reviews.review_text: Great pasta and pizza, very close to the eiffel tower. The service was very professional and quick. The pricea are a bit high, probably due to the tourist location.

Food was amazing. First time to try escargot and Im glad I tried it at this place.  The escargot had a really good pesto sauce. The pastas were good, plus the view while eating wasnt bad either. I will definitely come back to eat here if I ever decide to come back to Paris.
Food came late but it was AMAZING, this was my first time trying snails and it went beyond expectations ! Don t miss truffle risotto.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning We are happy to learn that your experience was satisfactory hope to welcome you soon
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Bonjour nous somme heureux d apprendre que votre experience etait satisfaisante esperons vous accueillir prochainement

reviews.review_text: Amazing food, service. So pretty! And no smoking! Loved it. 2 minutes from the Eiffel Tower and not overpriced.   oh and best aperol spritz.
Lovely little restaurant by Eiffel Tower. Stella was really nice and provided great service.
Yazid gave us great service! food was good and came out quickly. location is great near the Eiffel Tower. will come back! Thanks Yazid!

This was our first night in Paris and our last night. Wonderful cafe atmosphere.... Incredible food.... Fantastic service  the best place I have eaten in a long time... the chefs really know how to use spices well :)
The pizza, wine, pasta, and service were awesome. The little tables outside on a beautiful day were wonderful! Definitely a recommended establishment.
Yazid, was a great waiter! I had the steak and chips and porn star Martini- which is VERY strong, would recommend this place if you want a low key place

Nice place to have a dinner, ribeye steak was really good  . Coffy late and disert pavlova was nice too. Good service and they speak English. Kid-friendliness: They can cook some food for kids, like spaghetti only with cheese or   for kids
We were three guys from Germany and had a nice evening. The food and the drinks were good and the service was super. Shoutout to Mohammed
Excellent food. Ended up going twice on our visit because the food was so good. Get the hot olive oil it was delicious.
Awesome food! I really like the escargot and the steak was cooked to perfection! Well worth the price.
Love love love! Merci beaucoup for such amazing service and delicious food! Amazing experience
This is a lovely sidewalk cafe just a short walk from the Eiffel Tower.
Fantastic place!    Not so expensive but worth each price.

Loved this spot! We had a lot of food! Pasta Carbonara, octopus, steak and frites, and french onion soup and everything was delicious! Spent about close to 200 Euros for 4 including alcoholic beverages. It was nice area and the staff was in top of their game. I definitely bookmarked this spot whenever I am in Paris again. Not sure why I only took photos of the onion soup, it was so good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Good morning We are happy to learn that your experience was satisfactory hope to welcome you soon
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Bonjour nous somme heureux d apprendre que votre experience etait satisfaisante esperons vous accueillir prochainement

reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh!! I can t tell you enough about this pizza place!! Well, to start off the pizzas are to die for! I would highly recommend  The Regina , but you MUST have the pizza with goat cheese, honey, and arugula. I m sure if you make a stop here you won t be disappointed in the beverages. They were absolutely phenomenal. The interior was gorgeous as well. If it s in your range I d definitely put it on my list!

I really enjoyed dinner at this restaurant. I recommend it.  I came with a friend and we did not book a table in advance, but they found a good table for us.  the beautiful girl the waitress was very kind and polite, communicated pleasantly, said compliments, made a very good mood that evening.  served quickly and extremely quickly our ordered dishes were ready, it was amazing.  I have not felt such a pleasant service for a long time.  We were very pleased and the food was very tasty.  I especially liked the without alcohol fresh fruit cocktail which was very nicely presented and tasty and a big glass,not every cafe have nice cocktails from fresh juice.its worth that money
Nice place, very welcoming and fast service. We ordered pasta it was tasty!! We will definitely go back!

Ate here with my love. Great place. The interior is very welcoming and warm. I asked for an extra spicy penne arrabiata, and god, was it good and spicy. The tiramisu was out of this world. Waiter was very friendly
Roma salad was fresh and tasty and Gnocchi al Tartufo made my day. Excellent service! Good to go!
We had a great dinner. Good food, and the service was excellent. Open until late.
Possibly one of the best eating joints in and around the Eiffel Tower. While the food is good as it is the staff is a real icing on the cake. Mimi deserves a special mention, keep up the good work
